After lui x1, 0xFEDCC         # pc = 0x00, x1 = 0xFEDCC000:
x 0 = 0x00000000
x 1 = 0xFEDCC000
x 2 = 0x00000000
x 3 = 0x00000000
x 4 = 0x00000000
x 5 = 0x00000000
x 6 = 0x00000000
x 7 = 0x00000000
x 8 = 0x00000000
x 9 = 0x00000000
x10 = 0x00000000

After addi x1, x1, 0xA98      # pc = 0x04, x1 = 0xFEDCBA98:
x 0 = 0x00000000
x 1 = 0xFEDCBA98
x 2 = 0x00000000
x 3 = 0x00000000
x 4 = 0x00000000
x 5 = 0x00000000
x 6 = 0x00000000
x 7 = 0x00000000
x 8 = 0x00000000
x 9 = 0x00000000
x10 = 0x00000000

After sw x1, 0(x0):
x 0 = 0x00000000
x 1 = 0xFEDCBA98
x 2 = 0x00000000
x 3 = 0x00000000
x 4 = 0x00000000
x 5 = 0x00000000
x 6 = 0x00000000
x 7 = 0x00000000
x 8 = 0x00000000
x 9 = 0x00000000
x10 = 0x00000000

After lw x2, 0(x0):
x 0 = 0x00000000
x 1 = 0xFEDCC000
x 2 = 0x00000000
x 3 = 0x00000000
x 4 = 0x00000000
x 5 = 0x00000000
x 6 = 0x00000000
x 7 = 0x00000000
x 8 = 0x00000000
x 9 = 0x00000000
x10 = 0x00000000
